txt_en: The only true power comes from within.
txt_cn: 真正的力量源自内心。

txt_en: You are the light of my life.
txt_cn: 你是我的生命之光。

txt_en: We have seen our way through even the darkest nights.
txt_cn: 即便在至暗黑夜，也能找到前进道路。

txt_en: Seize the day. Gather your rosebuds while you may.
txt_cn: 折花趁年华，莫负好时光。

txt_en: You can't let fear hold you back.
txt_cn: 别让恐惧阻止你。

txt_en: If you've come this far, maybe you're willing to come a little further.
txt_cn: 既然已跋涉至此，不妨一鼓作气，走得更远些。

txt_en: You are scored on my heart.
txt_cn: 你在我的心上留下了印记。

txt_en: Every good thing started with dreams.
txt_cn: 世上所有的美好，都源于梦想。

txt_en: Sometimes we don't realize how important something is until it's gone.
txt_cn: 有时，我们在失去后才懂得珍惜。

txt_en: The future is never truly set.
txt_cn: 未来一切皆有可能。

txt_en: It is not too late to seek a newer world.
txt_cn: 找寻你的新天地永远也不算晚。

txt_en: I stand before you now with only one agenda. "To let you know my heart is yours."
txt_cn: 我站在你面前，只有一事相许：我的心只属于你。

txt_en: We're going forward to the future, not back into the past.
txt_cn: 我们要走向未来，而不是沉湎于过去。

txt_en: What is a friend? It's a single soul dwelling in two bodies.
txt_cn: 什么是朋友？是拥有相同灵魂的两个人。

txt_en: You will never age for me.
txt_cn: 在我心中，你永远年轻。

txt_en: I spent so long in the darkness. I'd almost forgotten how beautiful the moonlight is.
txt_cn: 在黑暗中太久，都快忘却黑夜下月光的美。

txt_en: We may get knocked down, but we'll never be knocked out.
txt_cn: 我们或许会被击倒，却绝不会被打败。

txt_en: With this hand, I will lift your sorrows.
txt_cn: 尽我之力，解你烦忧。

txt_en: You never lose everything.
txt_cn: 你永远不会失去一切。

txt_en: We can't leave our children in the world without hope.
txt_cn: 我们不能让孩子们活在没有希望的世界。

txt_en: CHASE THE THRILL
txt_cn: 驾「控」 触动心潮

txt_en: Winter's a good time to stay in and cuddle.
txt_cn: 冬天适合待在室内相互依偎。

txt_en: People love what other people are passionate about.
txt_cn: 充满热情的付出总是令人动容。

txt_en: The business of life is the acquisition of memories.
txt_cn: 人生就是不断收获回忆的过程。
